ac: 24, touch 14, flat-footed 20 (+5 armor, +1 deflection, +3 Dex, +1 dodge, +5 natural, -1 size)
other_gear: +1 hide armor, amulet of mighty fists +1, elixir of fire breath, ring of jumping, ring of protection +1, barbed troll claws*, 315 gp
feats: Cleave, Combat Reflexes, Cooperative Rend*, Dodge, Great Cleave, Great Rend*, Power Attack, Weapon Focus (bite), Weapon Focus (claw)
senses: darkvision 60 ft., low-light vision, scent; Perception +6

sections.body: Before Combat The render drinks his potions.

name: Troll Render
